page.title: 14SHOPPING
page.content: One of the best shopping areas lies on Harehills Lane, small shops line both sides of this road. There are a good range of shops and most of the items needed by local residents can be purchased there. B & Q Supercentre is busy all week. This store sells a huge range of goods for improving or maintaining one's home. It is one of the largest shops in the area. In the southern part of Seacroft estate there are not many shops. In one group of four shops two had windows boarded to prevent damage by vandals. One was completely closed and the other was continuing to trade behind its wooden defences. Another group of shops had steel wire mesh protection for their windows. Shopkeepers must find it difficult and dis-heartening to run a shop here.
